titleStmt.title: Pulpit-popery, true popery being an answer to a book intituled, Pulpit-sayings, and in vindication of the Apology for the pulpits, and the stater of the controversie against the representer.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randall Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Williams by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
